languages.text:
As long as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +12% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The Bladedancer also gains +8% dodge and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} ally in combat.

traits.locale_text:
As long as the Reaper has less than 50% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} remaining, the Reaper gains 12% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
The Reaper also gains 8% dodge and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} companion in combat.

The Bladedancer also gains +8% dodge and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} ally in combat.

languages.text:
Mientras el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} tiene menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, gana +12 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Además, el hoja danzante gana +8 % de esquiva y +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} por cada aliado {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g} en combate.

As long as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +12% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The Bladedancer also gains +8% dodge and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} ally in combat.

Mientras el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} tiene menos del 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, gana +12 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
Además, el hoja danzante gana +8 % de esquiva y +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} por cada aliado {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g} en combate.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%未満であるかぎり、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+12%と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+3を獲得する。
ブレードダンサーはまた、戦闘中で{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}の味方1人につき回避+8%と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+2を獲得する。
languages.original_text:
As long as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +12% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The Bladedancer also gains +8% dodge and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} ally in combat.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が50%未満であるかぎり、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}+12%と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+3を獲得する。
ブレードダンサーはまた、戦闘中で{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}の味方1人につき回避+8%と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+2を獲得する。

languages.text:
当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高12%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高3点。
每当刀锋舞者的盟友在战斗中陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，刀锋舞者的闪避提高8%，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}提高2点。

languages.text:
Tant que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} a moins de 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, il gagne +12 % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
Il gagne également +8 % d'esquive et +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour chaque allié qui a {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdu connaissance{/g}.

languages.text:
Solange der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} weniger als 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, erhält er +12 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Der Klingentänzer erhält zudem +8 % Ausweichen und +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlosen{/g} Verbündeten im Kampf.

Der Klingentänzer erhält zudem +8 % Ausweichen und +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlosen{/g} Verbündeten im Kampf.

languages.text:
Когда у {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} меньше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он получает +12% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Также танцор смерти получает +8% к уклонению и +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} за каждого союзника {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %50'nin altında kaldığı müddetçe +%12 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} değerlerine sahip olur.
Ayrıca Kılıç Dansçısı, çatışmadaki her {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} dost birim için +%8 kaçınma ve +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır.
